TopicTitle: Fill in the "black voids" in the ends of the 1.25m fuel tank textures.

Articles.Content: OK, this one is super nit-picky... but I just don't like the black voids in the center of the end-textures on the 1.25m fuel tanks. Anything would be better here-- a bolted plate, or a smooth panel, or something. It's not always practical to cover these over, when building landers. And it just looks "unfinished".
